channel.title: Need some help with two things
channel.description: can someone tell me how to remove objects( for instance say a tree) and how do u add objects also is it possible to edit the map and if so how?

item.title: Need some help with two things
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:10051”][quote author=Pkparadise0 link=topic=14587.msg2718640#msg2718640 date=1237827316]
right ok
go to client.java and search makeglobalobject then go right down to the bottom of it then copy and paste the code so it should look like this for example makeGlobalObject(2974, 3372, 2783, 0, 10);
^ ^ ^
| | |
right the first arrow and the second arrow are your corridinas sorry for bad speling the third arrow is the id and if you want to take away a object you have to just take away the makeGlobalObject(2974, 3372, 2783, 0, 10); just delete it ok so there… [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 10:57:12 am[/size][hr]srry the arrows didnt come our right the 2974,3372 is the corridnates and the 3372 is the id
[/quote]

i loled at you.

use you deleteobject method in client class.[/quote]
and i loled at you “use you”? good work.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with two things
